resources.string: Immunisation saves lives. It protects you, your family and your community. Immunisation helps protect future generations by eradicating diseases
Kinga huokoa maisha. Inakulinda wewe, familia yako na jamii yako. Kinga husaidia kulinda vizazi vijavyo kwa kutokomeza magonjwa

1. Injected on the upper left forearm at the junction of the lower two-thirds and the upper one third. 2.Administer an injection of 0.05ml of the reconstituted vaccine for infants less than one year old and 0.1 ml for children above 1 year

1.Children under 5years are given at birth or at any age upto 59months. 2. Preterm infants should receive the BCG vaccine at the time of discharge from hospital from hospital irrespective of the current weight.
1.For boPV,administer 2 drops orally which constitute one dose,for IPV administer as an intramuscular injection ,right outer thigh,2cm away from PCV site;Hexavalent administered intramuscular.
